title: Cliffhangers!
overview: Three different suspense thrillers in one action-filled hour! Each week, a new and chilling chapter unfolds in the continuing sagas of... STOP SUSAN WILLIAMS! Susan Williams trying to discover who murdered her brother! THE SECRET EMPIRE! Inside the earth, Marshall Jim Donner discovers a futuristic society! THE CURSE OF DRACULA! Dracula is dead. And living on the West Coast.
